H0.text: Which company makes/made a watch called 'Submariner'. Omega

H1.text: Which company makes/made a watch called 'Submariner'. Breitling

H2.text: Which company makes/made a watch called 'Submariner'. Tag Heuer

H3.text: Which company makes/made a watch called 'Submariner'. Rolex

A4.text: The Rolex Submariner is a line of sports watches designed for diving and manufactured by Rolex

A5.text: Subsidiary Montres Tudor SA offered similar designated and often similar looking diving watches for decades
